spec_data.Name: glite-lbjp-common-gss
spec_data.Description:
glite-security-gss wraps GSS functions (and several non-GSS Globus calls) to a
secure network communication library with strict timing control (via timeout
arguments) of all remote operations.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 04:29:16 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Wrapper of Globus GSS/SSL implementation used by gLite LB and JP
